trans-unit.source: Provider '{0}' does not have a Microsoft resource endpoint defined.
trans-unit.target: 提供者 '{0}' 未定義 Microsoft 資源端點。

trans-unit.source: Unable to find account info when acquiring token, please remove account and add again.
trans-unit.target: 取得權杖時找不到帳戶資訊，請移除帳戶，然後再新增一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to find configuration for Azure Resource {0}
trans-unit.target: 找不到 Azure 資源的設定 {0}

trans-unit.source: Your tenant {0} ({1}) requires you to re-authenticate again to access {2} resources. Press Open to start the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 您的租用戶 {0} ({1}) 需要再次重新驗證，才能存取 {2} 資源。請按 [開啟] 啟動驗證程序。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred in MSAL library when requesting auth code URL. For more detailed information on error, please check 'Azure Accounts' output pane.
trans-unit.target: 要求驗證碼 URL 時，MSAL 程式庫發生錯誤。如需錯誤的詳細資訊，請檢查 [Azure 帳戶] 輸出窗格。

trans-unit.source: Authentication failed due to a nonce mismatch, please close Azure Data Studio and try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為 nonce 不相符，導致驗證失敗，請關閉 Azure Data Studio，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Authentication failed due to a state mismatch, please close ADS and try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為狀態不相符，導致驗證失敗，請關閉 ADS，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Server could not start. This could be a permissions error or an incompatibility on your system. You can try enabling device code authentication from settings.
trans-unit.target: 無法啟動伺服器。這可能是系統的權限發生錯誤或系統不相容。可嘗試從設定啟用裝置代碼驗證。

trans-unit.source: A call was made to azdata.accounts.getSecurityToken, this method is deprecated and will be removed in future releases. Please use getAccountSecurityToken instead.
trans-unit.target: 已對 azdata.accounts.getSecurityToken 發出呼叫，此方法已淘汰，並將於日後的版本中移除。請改用 getAccountSecurityToken。

trans-unit.source: No Azure auth method available. You must enable the auth methods in ADS configuration.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何可用的 Azure 驗證方法。您必須在 ADS 組態中啟用驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: No Azure auth method selected. You must select what method of authentication you want to use.
trans-unit.target: 未選取任何 Azure 驗證方法。您必須選取要使用的驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: A tenant is required for this feature. Your Azure subscription seems to have no tenants.
trans-unit.target: 需要有租用戶，才能使用此功能。您的 Azure 訂閱似乎沒有任何租用戶。

trans-unit.source: You are not currently signed into any Azure accounts, Please sign in and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 您目前未登入任何 Azure 帳戶，請先登入，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: You must enable preview features in order to use Azure Cloud Shell.
trans-unit.target: 您必須啟用預覽功能，才能使用 Azure Cloud Shell。

trans-unit.source: You must select a tenant for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 您必須選取租用戶，此功能才能運作。

trans-unit.source: You must select an Azure account for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 您必須選取 Azure 帳戶，此功能才能運作。

trans-unit.source: Failed to get subscriptions for account {0}. Please refresh the account.
trans-unit.target: 無法取得帳戶 {0} 的訂用帳戶。請重新整理該帳戶。

適用於 NoSQL 的 Azure CosmosDB
適用於 PostgreSQL 叢集的 Azure CosmosDB

trans-unit.target: 適用於 MySQL 彈性伺服器的 Azure 資料庫

trans-unit.target: 適用於 PostgreSQL 的 Azure 資料庫彈性伺服器
適用於 PostgreSQL 的 Azure 資料庫伺服器
SQL 受控執行個體 - Azure Arc
無法辨識的提供者資源類型: {0}
無法辨識的提供者資源: {0}

trans-unit.source: Failed to acquire Access Token for account '{0}' (tenant '{1}').
trans-unit.target: 無法取得租用戶 '{0}' 的存取權杖 (租用戶 '{1}')。

trans-unit.source: Failed to get subscriptions for account {0} (tenant '{1}'). {2}
trans-unit.target: 無法取得帳戶 {0} (租用戶 '{1}') 的訂用帳戶。{2}

trans-unit.source: If you have not launched Azure Cloud Shell from this account before, please visit https://shell.azure.com/ to get started. Once you are set up, you can use AzureCloud Shell directly in Azure Data Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若您以前未從此帳戶啟動 Azure Cloud Shell，請前往 https://shell.azure.com/ 以開始使用。設定之後，即可在 Azure Data Studio 中直接使用 AzureCloud Shell。

trans-unit.source: Select Bash or PowerShell for Azure Cloud Shell
trans-unit.target: 選取適用於 Azure Cloud Shell 的 Bash 或 PowerShell

trans-unit.source: You must pick a shell type
Failed to load some Azure accounts. {0}
trans-unit.target: 無法載入某些 Azure 帳戶。{0}

trans-unit.source: Error fetching locations for account {0} ({1}) subscription {2} ({3}) tenant {4} : {5}
trans-unit.target: 擷取帳戶 {0} ({1}) 訂閱 {2} ({3}) 租用戶 {4} 的位置時發生錯誤: {5}

trans-unit.source: Error fetching resource groups for account {0} ({1}) subscription {2} ({3}) tenant {4} : {5}
trans-unit.target: 擷取帳戶 {0} ({1}) 訂閱 {2} ({3}) 租用戶 {4} 的資源群組時發生錯誤: {5}
擷取帳戶 {0} 的訂閱時發生錯誤: {1}

trans-unit.source: Error fetching subscriptions for account {0} tenant {1} : {2}
trans-unit.target: 擷取帳戶 {0} 租用戶 {1} 的訂閱時發生錯誤: {2}
已啟用 Azure Arc 的 PostgreSQL 超大規模資料庫

trans-unit.source: Azure Database for PostgreSQL flexible servers
trans-unit.target: 適用於 PostgreSQL 的 Azure 資料庫彈性伺服器
適用於 PostgreSQL 伺服器的 Azure 資料庫

trans-unit.source: Keys for token cache could not be saved in credential store, this may cause Azure access token persistence issues and connection instabilities. It's likely that SqlTools has reached credential storage limit on Windows, please clear at least 2 credentials that start with "Microsoft.SqlTools|" in Windows Credential Manager and reload.
trans-unit.target: 權杖快取的金鑰無法儲存在認證存放區中，這可能會導致 Azure 存取權杖持續性問題和連線不穩定。SqlTools 可能已達到 Windows 的認證儲存限制，請清除 Windows 認證管理員中以 「Microsoft.SqlTools|」 開始的至少 2 個認證，然後重新載入。

trans-unit.source: Modifying this setting requires reloading the window for all changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 修改此設定需要重新載入視窗，使所有變更生效。

trans-unit.source: No clouds are enabled, please enable a cloud to continue.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用雲端，請啟用雲端以繼續。
重新載入 Azure Data Studio
SQL 受控執行個體 - Azure Arc

trans-unit.source: Token cache has been cleared successfully, please reload Azure Data Studio.
trans-unit.target: 已成功清除權杖快取，請重載 Azure Data Studio。
阿拉伯聯合大公國中部
阿拉伯聯合大公國北部

trans-unit.source: Unable to get token for tenant {0}
trans-unit.target: 無法取得租用戶 {0} 的權杖

trans-unit.source: Unable to open link, missing required values
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟連結，缺少必要值

trans-unit.source: Warning: Azure PII Logging is enabled. Enabling this option allows personally identifiable information to be logged and should only be used for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 警告: Azure PII 記錄已啟用。啟用此選項後即可記錄個人識別資訊，且只能用於偵錯用途。

trans-unit.source: {0} setting changed, please reload Azure Data Studio.
trans-unit.target: {0} 設定已變更，請重載 Azure Data Studio。

trans-unit.source: Could not load endpoints from settings, please check the logs for more details.
trans-unit.target: 無法從設定載入端點，請查看記錄檔以取得詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Successfully loaded custom endpoints from settings
trans-unit.target: 已成功從設定載入自訂端點
Azure 儲存體資源端點尾碼
Azure: 重新整理所有帳戶

trans-unit.source: Browse and work with Azure resources
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽並使用 Azure 資源
清除 Azure 帳戶權杖快取

trans-unit.source: Client ID for Azure Data Studio
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Studio 的用戶端識別碼

trans-unit.source: Disable system keychain integration. Credentials will be stored in a flat file in the user's home directory.
trans-unit.target: 停用系統金鑰鏈整合。認證將會儲存於使用者主目錄的一般檔案中。
在 Azure 入口網站中開啟

trans-unit.source: Setting containing custom Azure authentication endpoints. Changes to this setting require a restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 設定包含自訂 Azure 驗證端點。變更到此設定需要重新開機才會生效。

trans-unit.source: Should Azure China integration be enabled
trans-unit.target: 是否應啟用 Azure 中國整合

trans-unit.source: Should Azure public cloud integration be enabled
trans-unit.target: 是否應啟用 Azure 公用雲端整合

trans-unit.source: Should Personally Identifiable Information (PII) be logged in the Azure Accounts output channel and the output channel log file.
trans-unit.target: 是否要將個人識別資訊 (PII) 記錄在 Azure 帳戶輸出通道與輸出通道記錄檔中。

trans-unit.source: Should US Government Azure cloud (Fairfax) integration be enabled
trans-unit.target: 是否應啟用 US Government Azure 雲端 (Fairfax) 整合

trans-unit.source: [Optional] The verbosity of logging for the Azure Accounts extension.
trans-unit.target: [選用] Azure 帳戶延伸模組的記錄詳細程度。
